titles.title: A bill to authorize financial assistance for the Northern Mariana Islands, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2661-2663)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-87.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Mineral Resources Development. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-87.

bill.summary: 3/10/1993--Introduced. Provides that this Act shall constitute a commitment of the United States to provide a specified amount of direct grant assistance to the Government of the Northern Mariana Islands for capital infrastructure construction.
